## IExecutableSpawnSyncOptions.input property

The content to be passed to the child process's stdin.

NOTE: If specified, this content replaces any IExecutableSpawnSyncOptions.stdio\[0\] mapping for stdin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
input?: string;
```
